channel.title: Fishing help!
channel.description:
anyone know how i can make a fishing loop like when u click on the npc id of the fishing water it loops and gives u a certain type of fish but slowley???
i have everything else working asin the npc click and coords i just need toknow how to loop it so it gives u fish like (shrimp) slow!!

item.title: Fishing help!
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:

Yeah well I don’t use Deltascape, maybe I code like Delta, but I don’t use his source. I told you, I make my own shit, and if you don’t know how to make a fishing loop, then you’re the retard, not me[/quote][quote=“kilop, post:10, topic:330615”]Yeah well I don’t use Deltascape, maybe I code like Delta, but I don’t use his source. I told you, I make my own shit, and if you don’t know how to make a fishing loop, then you’re the retard, not me[/quote][quote=“kilop, post:10, topic:330615”]Yeah well I don’t use Deltascape, maybe I code like Delta, but I don’t use his source. I told you, I make my own shit, and if you don’t know how to make a fishing loop, then you’re the retard, not me

says the one who gave me that code =)

item.title: Fishing help!
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

[quote=“kilop, post:3, topic:330615”]Put in this in your client.java

[code] if (NPCID == 316) {
/* Net From Net & Bait - Any Sea */
if ((IsItemInBag(303) == true)) {
startFishing(316);
} else {
sM(“You need a " + getItemName(303)
+ " to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 321) {
startFishing(321);
} else if (NPCID == 322) {
startFishing(322);
} else if (NPCID == 323) {
startFishing(323);

		} else {
    faceNPC(NPCSlot);
		}
		if (PutNPCCoords == true) {
			skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
			skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
		}[/code][/quote]

lmao? thats not gona help me at all

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing help!
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

Put in this in your client.java

[code] if (NPCID == 316) {
/* Net From Net & Bait - Any Sea */
if ((IsItemInBag(303) == true)) {
startFishing(316);
} else {
sM(“You need a " + getItemName(303)
+ " to fish here.”);
}
} else if (NPCID == 321) {
startFishing(321);
} else if (NPCID == 322) {
startFishing(322);
} else if (NPCID == 323) {
startFishing(323);

		} else {
    faceNPC(NPCSlot);
		}
		if (PutNPCCoords == true) {
			skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
			skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
		}[/code]

Read full topic
